project_id.description: ID of the project to which this branch belongs.

merged.description: Indicates if the changes in this branch have been merged into another branch.

protected.description: Indicates if the branch is protected to prevent direct pushes.

developers_can_push.description: Indicates if developers can push changes to this branch.

developers_can_merge.description: Indicates if developers can merge changes to this branch.

can_push.description: Indicates if the user has permission to push changes to this branch.

default.description: Indicates if this is the default branch of the project.

web_url.description: URL to view the branch in a web browser.

commit_id.description: ID of the commit associated with this branch.

commit.description: Details about the commit associated with this branch.
